text:
COMMUNICATIONS
Address all communications regarding the Third American Exhibition of
Recordings of Educational Radio Programs to I. Keith Tyler, Institute for
Education by Radio, Ohio State University, Columbus, Ohio.
“EDUCATION ON THE AIR”
The proceedings of the nine previous Institutes for Education by Radio—
1930, I93U 1932, 1933, 1934, 1935. 1936, 1937, and 1938, as well as the
volume published in 1939, may be obtained from Ohio State University
Bookstore at $3 a volume.
« 6 »
